name: crm-data-challenge-with-json
description: You just started a new job.  Your boss comes over and says that their CRM (customer-relationship-management) app is too hard to work with, and that you need to do some data transformation.  They tell you that you will get a big hash of all the data, and you need to write some code that will take that data and convert it to other data structures more useful to the business.
